content.detailedDescription: First, let me explain that this is an old experience, but one that i rememberwith absolute clarity as if it had happened only yesterday.  since the sightingincident, i have spent twenty years in the air force working at variousassignments involving operations and command and control of aircraft andsatellites.  after my retirement in 1979, i worked with lockheed corporations,ford aerospace, and martin marietta as an engineer, or in a management capacityon various satellite programs and the space shuttle program.  after all theyears that have passed since the sighting and all my experience in the aerospaceindustry96 nothing has happened that would make my wife and i change my mind about thenature of what we saw that day.It was 1959 and in the month of march.  my wife pat and i had been married forthree months and both of us were barely over the age of eighteen.  it was almostdusk and we were returning from a visit to a friends house to see the couple92s newly born baby.  we were in south el monte california.  el monte, at thetime was a small town of less than twenty thousand people located aboutseventeen miles east of the los angeles civic center  along what is now i10. south el monte was an area on the outskirts of el monte proper that consisted ofmostly open fields, older homes and a few small farms.  we were driving up peckroad with almost no other traffic around us.  it was a clear day with verylittle cloud cover and the area street lights had not yet come on for the night. we  first saw the vehicle  moving slowly parallel to the road we were on andmoving in the same direction.  it was very low, less than two hundred feet offthe ground and  traveling over the power lines along the side of the road.  itwas circular in shape and about the size of a boeing 707.  the surface of thecraft was made of a dark metal that seemed to absorb all light and appeared tobe the flattest black imaginable.  around the saucer shape92s edge where white lights that flashed like sequential strobe lights.  at thetop and center of the craft was a red light and in the same position on theunderside was a green light that remained constantly on.  the lights, whilebright, did not reflect on the surface of the vehicle.  at this time, we wereapproximately 50 yards from it and could hear no sound coming from it.  let meemphasize this was not just a strange light high in the sky, nor was it ablurred ball of light, or in any way organic.  this was an actual, physicallyapparent vehicle obvious
content.summary: Matte black saucer shaped craft with perimiter lig

content.detailedDescription: I am always watching the sky - because i know they are out there . i havewitnessed sightings since i was 12 yrs. old. everywhere i go i see them . ifirst witnessed them in phoenix,az.Fairbanks,ak.And lake tawakoni,tx. and now in farmersville, tx. ive seen numerous shapes andsizes and colors... ive lost hours out of the nights before...

I was in the kitchen making coffee. my apartment is on the top floor of thebuilding. i noticed a bright flash like an electric charge. when i turned tolook out the window i saw an oval object that appeared to be like ice. it wasearly morning in winter in south africa so the sun was still quite low. i ranonto the landing and saw the object disappear behind the other buildings in thearea. at the time i felt light headed and dazed. i was aware that what i saw wasnot usual, however i first thought it was a helicopter, but then that was only abrief thought. the flash of blue light made me look out the window. before thati had been at the washbasin facing the wall.I have not reported or spoken to anyone about this incident. shortly after thisi was institutionalised for severe depression and aggression. i don92t know if what i saw affected me. i was at the time an officer in the southafrican military. i have never been prone to believing in para normal orextraterrestrial activities.

I was driving home from school at about 4pm on westbound interstate 44 in stlouis in early september. there was a lot of traffic so i wasnt moving veryfast. i glanced up to the skies in the north and saw a thin, gray object in thesky. at first i thought it was an airplane but then i soon realized it was notmoving. completely stationary. after almost crashing because of my wonder, icorrected my course on the road. it was after i looked up the second time that isaw that not only was the first object in the same location it had been, therewas now an identical sliver of gray, possibly closer. both of which wereunmoving i assume this because i had moved on the highway, and the objects werenow out my pasenger window. still trying to watch and drive, i glanced back upagain and the second disk vanished. then about ten seconds later the originalobject vanished as well. the whole episode lasted about three minutes.
content.summary: Two unmoving, vanishing disks over the skies of st

content.detailedDescription: I was at home watching a movie and i had the feeling that i should look outside, so i did. i saw a light that i thought was an aeroplane so i watched it for a few moments and realized that it wasn't a plane, so i asked my wife for the binoculars. it took a few moments for her to find them and when i had them i saw that what i was looking at was a sphere with octagon shaped lights  reminded me of a solar panel in the shape there was one large flashing light that could be seen with the naked eye, but with the binoculars i saw that they all were flashing dimmer than the one larger one that changed color and position on the sphere. the dimmer lights seemed to be pulsating in different colors all over the sphere. i asked my wife for our video camera and believe that i have a tape of a segment of it. the 8mm camera that i have is old so it only has a 8 zoom. we watched the sphere for about 15 -20 mins. then it disapeared over the horizon. we also saw a plane fly across the path of the sphere. it continued on a western path in what appeared to be a straight line.
content.summary: Sphere with octagon shaped pulsating lights on the

content.detailedDescription: On a roving guard ,attached to the 2nd bn.5th cav 1st cav div,on the saudi -iraqborder, it was getting close to the next one hour guard rotation.I sat under acamoflauge canopy,to wait the few minutes left.I had an m16,an m60with noammo,night vision goggles,and a field telephonepr-77.I used none of these duringthe event.As i waited,a very bright light approached behind me.I assumed it tobe a groud vehicle.The light emmitted was irridescent,every color of therainbow,simultaneously.The vehicle came closer,then i realized it wasairborne.As it began to pass behind me,i turned up the level on my biclighter,and lit a cigarette,leaving the lighter lit for maybe 30 seconds.Thecraft immediately turned off its bottom mounted beacon,and began to pan aroundin front of me.It was maybe 30 feet away,and maybe 25 feet off the ground,belowradar detection capability,i think. it was completely silent,and gave off someform of energy signature,which i felt. then it slowly began to gyroscopicallyoscillate,faster and faster,until it became like a round object.Before that,itresembled a disc,with a cupola,a segmented leading edge,and a beacon on thebottom.Then it stopped oscillating.The following lights appeared,in thisorderthe lights were the size of a half dollar.Three lights in the form of atriangle.Four lights in the shape of a rectangle, then one pinpoint light,whichstretched in two opposing directions,approximately four-six feet long.I felthypnotized,but not afraid.In fact ,i outstretched my right arm towards it,straining every muscle in my arm. the next thing i remember is walking back tothe platoons tent,after the disc floated north,towards iraq. my watch showedthat over an hour had passed,yet it only seemed like two or three minutes. at nopo

My girlfriends and i go to myrtle beach every year in sept. one of our favoritethings to do is sit on the beach in the late night and talk. it was the nightbefore the full moon which i believe was 909. we were talking and noticing howclose mars was to the moon. i noticed a very bright orangish yellowish star ithought over the ocean but it was too large to be a star. it was gone in about 1to 2 seconds it just seemed to go out. i asked my friends if they had seen itand of course they had not.We continued talking and in about 10 minutes later itappeared again and this time they both saw it. it would move behind acloud and then appear again over the horizion but this time to the left.Theamount of movement appeared to fast for any kind of airplane or flying object wewould be familiar with. again it would move behind cloud cover and appear in adifferent location. then it just disappeared and we didnt see it again. none ofus had ever seen anything like it before and asked several people staying in thesame area if they had noticed anything. no one had and the local paper made nomention of it. we would love to know what it was and if we indeed saw somethingnot of our own making.  i dont know my friends e-mail addresses

I was driving home from work southbound on loop 12 to spur 408 out of irving tx.The object was directly ahead of me  above the road - the bright lights and sizeof the object were impossible to miss.  i slowed down  tried to determine if theobject was moving, but it was hovering in one place above the road.  iconsidered calling 911, but could not take my eyes off of the aircraft. it was acylinder shaped object hovering in a vertical position and  was as large orlarger than a commercial airliner.  it had one large round white light at thetop and one large round red light at the bottom.  the lights were so bright thatit was difficult to see any other details about the craft.  it hovered over theroad and then rotated clockwise until the red light was on top.  it then movedto one side of the road and hovered again  rotated to a horizontal position andthen back to a vertical position.  it moved again to the opposite side of theroad and what appeared to be an arm or wing came out from the side of the craft. this had a red light on the end and smaller red lights pulsating in a circularmotion around it so that now the craft looked sort of l shaped.  a white beam oflight shot out of the end of the arm and i could see it moving around on theground.  the craft moved always in a horizontal fashion around and the beam wasshining around on the ground.During this time, traffic was slowed to 25-30 mph because it appeared that wewere all watching.  some vehicles pulled over and some people were getting outof their vehicles.  i kept driving slowly southbound and watched the entire way. as i traveled southward, the craft moved west out over mountainview lake.I lost sight of the object when the road goes through a hilly area  i exitedonto i-20 just east of grand prairie. i estimate that i watched the object foranywhere from 5-10 minutes.

This was the strangest act of the moving stars you see very often up here inalaska that i have ever seen since first observing them may of 2000. oneconstellation in particular completely was affected in that all the stars withinchanged their position in the sky almost at the same time, as if to bemechanically inclined to do so. within nearly twenty minutes, i had observedeasily twenty moving stars mostly to the north of my location, some of whichbrightened so much they were hard to look at for a moment.I do kick myself in the ass for ever selling my videocamera now...As that wouldhave been some incredible footage. i have watched the moving stars in alaska foryears now, and found myself almost scared at the amount of activity i was seeingat that moment because it was almost like we were being invaded in the sky and iwas the only one noticing.The stars would head straight in one direction before ailing another star tostart moving itself, all creating a particular clockwise motion in the sky withtheir strange rotation, as if trading places in the sky. i just stepped out asecond ago just now, and there still are one or two moving stars right at thisinstant in the sky.

The day after submitting report to you we saw a hovering flashing light in thesky.  red, green and white randomly flashing lights that do not move. as many as5 seperate objects spread throughout the sky, miles apart.  have seen theselights every night since 98.  tonight 911most visible light is in same place asevery other night.  also noticed light that appears to be over roswell tonight. all lights appear to be identical.
content.summary: Red, white, green flashing lights hovering in one

content.detailedDescription: The electricity had gone out in the rural area where i live. siezing the momentof clear skys, i laid out in an open field on my back and was gazing at thebeautiful stars. after just a few moments maybe 10 minutes, an orangered vappeared in the sky with stars above and below it. it was traveling rapidly in ase direction, the legs of the v facing forward. it traveled almost out of mysight, then came back in the opposite direction.  i did not stay to watch it anylonger as an intense fear overcame me. i ran inside and collapsed, curled up ina ball, not able to speak and had hyper-ventilated breathing.  i have never beenso frightened in my life, and ive seen ufos several times throughout my lfe. dont know what was so different about this one - why it frightened me sohorrifically.

Me and all of our college friends were in a fireld having one of the biggest parties and me and two other people went of tohave a threesome for the first time and all of the sudden we heard a wierdnoise, we thought it was one of us but then the two guys started to make out andi noticed that there was a strange object in the air. they both stopped whatthey were doing and watched for a few minutes , and then it flew off.
content.summary: It was like a long shiny smooth metallic object

content.detailedDescription: Kevin and i were walking along  the beach in cape may, new jersey from thelighthouse, walking north. i felt a stange sensation that someone was watchingus. i am a military brat so i can sense when i am being watched. i am usuallyright on the nose with people. as we reached the town near the beach, i lookedover to my left about 9pm est and saw two red orange lights bigger then i haveever seen that quickly spread outwards into about 10 lights in each directionand then converged into two lights as if lining up and it got extremely brightin the sky and then there was a flash of sparklers that cannot be compared tofireworks and then disappeared. it looked very much like a calculated formation.I grew up on military installations most my life and understand seeingformations, but i have never seen anything like this ever. the lights were toobright to be planes and do not look like anything i have ever seen in the skybefore. they werent flares because i have seen every type of flare with myfather in the military and it was too high to be a flare and there was no trail.The lights were about about 8 times brighter then mars. shortly after theformation, the lights would show up singular or with three in formation neareach other and then blink out. on one occassion the light stayed on for a periodof just over a minute and then disappeared. my first reacton was fear andanxiety. i have a background in physics and was shocked to see what i saw. icould not believe it. i have brothers who are pilots in the air force so thiswas very bizarre. afterwards, i was still afraid and did not know what the hellthat was. i am a person of reason so this was a very bizarre thing to witness.The objects disappeared and did not appear for long periods of time. this lastedabout over 30 minutes.

1 i was lying in bed in my moms room,looking for u.F.Os.                     2 ashhhhhh noise.                                                            3 2two handled frying pans put together with six blue lights flying over trout lakecrooked.4standing still against my will, numb.5 i described it on 3. 6 it wenttoo far east.

I was travelling southbound on hwy 29 going se making sales calls when i saw acircular object zoom by me in the corner of my cars windshield.  it was a dullsilver disc oval-distorted with a small, dull, circular yellow center in it. the weather was excellent, sunny and the sun was behind me so it was not areflection in the windshield.  it happened so fast that if i was not lookingthat way, i would have not seen it drivers side top corner of windshield.  itleft what i called a video strobe across the horizon for a split second andthere seemed to be a intermittent vapor trail in the sky.  it seemed to be a 100feet up or less and maybe a 100 away.  i pulled over to get a better look and itwas long gone. i stopped by my next customer and their guard in the guard towerdid not see anything. my reaction was, what was that and did i see what i thinki saw   mentioned this to my boss the next day and got lots of ridicule...Thatis why i never reported it.  i cant believe how many people first laughed atwork when i told them what happened.  i think it is scary that something likethis roams the skies and the government wont explain it or do something aboutit.  i saw what i saw.  george davis
In my back yard i felt calm and cool the objects moved in all derections andthey were all white and blazing like fire.And they were all coming out of thesuns corona

My older brother, my girlfriend, and myself were heading what i believe is easton highway 407 towards justin, tx.  i think it was east, but is is a countryroad with many s curves and goes many directions, but the general path is east. i was driving, my brother was in the passenger seat, and my girlfriend was inthe back seat, behind me on the drivers side.  my car is a 2003 volkswagenjetta, which comes with this monsoon sound system, the only reason i mention itis that it might be able to explain the error message the lcd screen was givingme, as i have never seen it.  we were listening to a cd which suddenly stoppedand there was a loud beep, and the lcd screen dimmed and said no cd.  theinstrument and head lights also dimmed, kind of wavering between dim and dimmer. i thought maybe i was having a battery or alternator problem.  i wanted to pullover, but it was a new car, i was going 55, and there was no shoulder on thisroad, so i started slowing down, but then we all started to hear a really deeppulsating sound, that had an effect much like when you are ascending in aairplane, filling the ears.  thatasss

I awake in my room around 500 during the early summer a year ago, i look out mywindow by some sort of psychic trance. i thought i was going insane when i sawit or some sort of toy until i saw how it was moving and figuring how my brainworks, i conceding that wasnt going crazy by the fact that alot of strangecoincidences have occured in my family. durring my encounter i was practicallymentally stable, although i had felt a certain entity from the object. after isaw the sighting i was puzzled of its existence figuring whether or not is wasan object constructed by a foreign country or if it were by our own nation.Later i concluded by the energy i since whether or not it was an extreterrestialcraft by the energy i since from it. the object moved infront of a a pine treenear my bedroom window, the tree itself is only estimately 2 feet in diameterand the craft was only a bit wider. it move mostly in a straight like westwardthen turned south west, still at the same altitude. i lose sight of the objectby it moving past my area of sight from my window.
content.summary: The craft from my bedroom window

content.detailedDescription: At around 10 or 11 pm friday evening, my 11 year old daughter and a friend werewalking up her driveway when they stated that an huge square object with lightsall around it and a square red colored screen on it, approached them over top ofthem and two lights beamed down on them.  they heard no noises like a plain orhelicopter.  it shined on them for a few seconds then it turned the lights offand then dissappeared.  it came from the east then dissappeared towards thewest.
content.summary: Object with lights and a red screen

content.detailedDescription: At around 10 or 11 pm friday evening, my 11 year old daughter and a friend werewalking up her driveway when they stated that an huge round object with lightsall around it approached them over top of them and two lights beamed down onthem.  they heard no noises like a plain or helicopter.  it shined on them for afew seconds then it turned the lights off and then dissappeared.  it came fromthe east then dissappeared towards the west.

when i was  around ten or eleven years old,i was looking out the window of my room one night , looking for shooting stars. then i saw this roundish bright moving thing  moveing slowly across the sky. i watched it for maybe 3 or 4 min. i think.  then it speeded up in a upward way pretty fast. the next morning i told my folks. they just smiled saying , to much movies. soon afew more friends and family  knew. then i  told no one else about it. then the next night. i waited  at the same window to see if i see it again. i waited for about two or three hrs. got tired and sleepy . my little brother was already sound asleep.I gone ahead and did the same and went to sleep . next thing i know, i awoke . my brother still asleep next to me . this something is on the bed with us,looking at me . now the bed is in the corner of the room under the window. imscared out my skin .  if you ever been scared as a kid, you know the  be verystill  thing. thinking it wont see us or it go away.  that is what i did .Imscared, sweating. trying not to breath that loud . i try to move my hand whileunder the covers. hopeing that it not see my hand move twards my little brothersarm. i start to thump him on the arm, but he does not wakeup. so, i start topinch him on the arm, the side, or the leg, but he doesent wake up. so i stare,this thing stares back. next thing i know is, that its morning. now, when myfolks see my little brothers arm, side, and leg. they see the red marks and thebruses from the pinches i gave him trying to get him to wake up.  after that, igot the belt put on my back side. pretty good to, for what i did to my brother.Then i started to have these dreams , and my sences gotten better. strangethings started to happen to me.Example . the dreams that i get is always in the same room everytime. the sameperson everytime. they keep showing me things. teaching me how to use them

I was a security guard at a private camping resort in the area. that evening theother guard on duty had informed me that the local newspaper had a front pagearticle about ufos being spotted about some 30 miles west of our location theprevious night. so at approximately 0300 as i was exiting a building that i hadbeen checking i felt a strangeness as in being watched. what i seen i still amnot sure but to put this into perspective my vehicle was parked approximately 10 from the doorway but when i exited the building all i could see was thesethree lights one to my right blue in color pulsing slowly almost hypnoticallyand then the center one was green also pulsing in the same manner and the to myleft was a red light that did not pulse but i think this red light made me awareof the situation i was in  there wasnt any sounds  since this time i have beentrying to figure out what it was about i sometimes feel as though i hadcommunicated with them to be more giving and something about children

I was lying on a beach on the north east of mallorca, spain cala torta, feelingrelaxed and calm. i was looking at the sky and suddenly i saw what i thought wasa small private plane. the sun shone on its metallic surface as it flew by forabout 30 seconds. i thought i was about to hear the noise of the plane, when itsuddenly vanished into thin air. i didnb4t fade away into the distance, but it completely dissapeared in a fraction ofa second. for a moment i thought it could have been a meteorological balloon,but it couldnb4t have dissapeared like that.

I have carried newspapers as a second job for over 25 years. i had stopped on myroute around 5am in oct of 1989. i was facing east and noticed thick cloudshovering at ground level across the horizon in front of me. there appeared to bea bright light within the clouds. my first thought was this was in the generaldirection of some car dealerships and maybe it was one of the large spotlightsthat was left on. watched this for about 3045 seconds when suddenly the sky wasfilled with a tremendous amount of sparks. they filled the horizon and as thesparks went up, started to taper off. at the apex, the sparks died out and iwitnessed a saucer shaped craft hovering. i was so shocked, i jumped out of mytruck to get a better view. i cannot tell you how far away it was but i sawwindows, rectangular in shape around the middle of the craft. it stated to rotatin a counter clock wise direction, heade south. as it moved behind the tree linei remembered seeing an acquaintance that was walking on the street i had justturned off from. i turned around, raced back up to the streeet, and saw thisacquaintance, staring at the sky, with his mouth wide open. i pulled up and myrttold me to look in the sky,as to what was flying across it. i told him, hellmyrt, i saw it take off when i got to work that morning i called my best friend,a now retired winston salem policeman. he started joking about it and pooh poodme off. that same afternoon right after dinner he called and said, boy, i haveto apologize to you. i asked why and he said that the dept had received over 500calls that morning and day about bright lights in the sky that morning. i haveonly shared this story with a few close friends until i saw the show on ufo hotspots in the history channel today and thought this may be of interest to yourgroup.

for four years we have been under great stress because the military, and cia  have been monitoring us constantly. they have cameras on us in every  residence. were being spyed on. we have had many illegal experiments done. my  mother before i was born was part of something done to her, alien dna  manipulation. now i have advanced abilities, and so do my kids now. we have  been attracting aliens for foue years. all kinds of species. they have been  contacting us psychically, there has been wormholes, lizzards crawling up and  down our walls. greys constantly coming. we can sense, and feel ufo any where  in the sky. they have been sending pulse beams into every residence. they have  been using some sort of electrical thing on me almost every night. we have  electromagnetic sensitivity, esp, paranormal past and present, psychic  sensing, sense, feel, see what others cant. my son, and i can actually feel  the shape of anyone using stealthinvisibility we can feel them touching our  bodies. we have been able to be alert enough to see them place the room were  standing in, and place it into their space. we can actually feel objects in  their space. there is alot more. the military, and cia have been keeping us  under deep surveilance because we attract many aliens. my guess is that we are  the only way they can tell what the aliens are up to now. these agencies have  been following us thru nevada, and california....This is the whole honest to  gods truth. i, and my son both can read what the aliens want. that is whats  throwing the military into chaos because of our advanced capabilities.

While swinging my toddler son in the front driveway to help him fall asleep, hebegan to point into the sky and mutter as he does whenever he sees an airplane iam a student pilot and we look for airplanes every night together.  i loked upto see a very bright light brighter than any star or mars which is nearing itsclosest point and is the second brightest object after the moon.  the lightfaded and grew brighter for about 20 seconds....It was almost directly above us,but we heard no sound at all and the light never moved...Just pulsed....Then itfaded within a few seconds and was gone.
content.summary: Bright light seen at night not moving, but pulsati

content.detailedDescription: 1at home and finding out what the dogs were barking at. 2a feeling of beingwatched and something telling me to look up. 3mars. 4joy and excitement. 5shapecigar with 5 lights connected in a row, surrounded by red glow. changed shape tosaucer shape with hub on top, turned at a 45 degree angle when a meteor shot byunderneath it. then moved higher and changed shape again to a ball with 2diagonal tails from the backbottom. 6did not lose site of object. it movedacross sky to another position in sw quadrent.
content.summary: Red cigar with five bright connecting lights, plus

content.detailedDescription: I had just left a restaurant and was headed home.  i saw a bright light headedtoward brownsville and i though it was a plane.  the airport was not in the areof the object so i stopped and watched to see where it was going.  all i saw atthat time was one large bright light, it looked like it was going to set down onthe tail section but leveled off and keep coming toward me.  as it passeddirectly overhead i could have hit it with a rock.  it was moving very slow anddid not make a sound, a orange colored haze was coming from the rear of thecraft.  it seems like i was directly under this object for 5 to 10 minutes andcould not move even though i was scared and wanted to run.  i watched it go intomexico and the next day a report was in the local paper with drawing provided byanother witness.  this was along the interstate so a lot of people saw this andsome even turned around in the interstate and headed back in to brownsville.

Me and my friend went outside his house by kings plaza mall in brooklyn, it hadlust rained. a little cloudy and some lightning in the distance. we saw the skylight up from a lightning bolt and we saw a black circle iun the sky, my friendbrought it to my attention and asked me if i saw it. i thought it was a fighterjet cause it made a rumble but it got above us at one point and it was black anda perfect circle, we dicdnt understand what we were seeing. it was trveling in astraight line, he called his little sister outside and she looked at it to. itchanged directions and headed staright up really fast. it slowed down, went in adifferent direction and started going so high we couldnt see it. it went behindsome clouds.
content.summary: Brooklyn ufo sighting of large black disk

content.detailedDescription: I was on top of one of the buildings outside of downtown dayton with one of myfriends trying to take a picture of downtown dayton as the sun went down.I tookone picture of just the sky.At the time i did not notice anything,but when i gothome and looked looked at the picture of the sky i noticed three glowing ballsin a triangle formation.I have the picture if you would like to see it.
